An answer to a small treatise call'd Just measurs in an epistle of peace and love : by way of address, to such as esteem themselves elders amongst the people call'd Quakers ... Hogg, John, fl. 1675-1698.

s.n.], [London : 1693.
Signed: J.H. [i.e., John Hogg]. Cf. BM. Place of publication from Wing. Errata: p. [3]. Reproduction of original in British Library.
